Instruction:
Task Description: Create a gRPC client class in Java that connects to both full and solidity nodes of a blockchain network, allowing for transaction creation and broadcasting.

Class Description: The GrpcClient class establishes gRPC connections to blockchain nodes (full and solidity) and provides methods for transaction operations. It manages channel lifecycle and provides blocking stub interfaces for synchronous communication.

Attributes:
- channelFull: [ManagedChannel] - Channel for connection to the full node
- channelSolidity: [ManagedChannel] - Channel for connection to the solidity node
- blockingStubFull: [WalletGrpc.WalletBlockingStub] - Blocking stub for full node operations
- blockingStubSolidity: [WalletSolidityGrpc.WalletSolidityBlockingStub] - Blocking stub for solidity node operations
- blockingStubExtension: [WalletExtensionGrpc.WalletExtensionBlockingStub] - Blocking stub for extension operations

Methods:
- GrpcClient(String fullnode, String soliditynode) -> [void] - Constructor that initializes connections to specified nodes
- shutdown() -> [void] - Gracefully shuts down all active channels
- createTransaction(AccountUpdateContract contract) -> [Transaction] - Creates a transaction using the full node stub
- broadcastTransaction(Transaction signaturedTransaction) -> [boolean] - Broadcasts a signed transaction and returns operation result
